content: Oh, and Daikabutomaru says hello too! Not that I can understand a word <style=Highlight>beetles</style> say... but hey, as long as our hearts are in sync—
info: 伊佐奇复活-伊佐奇-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A点头}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>... Mm-hmm, it's just as easy to remember as my best bud, Daikabutomaru.

content: Mmmmmmm—{A开心}I knew it! You must be the legendary Masked He—mmph, I mean, my savior!

content: I can help, but it'll cost you a little something.

content: My name is <style=NpcName>Isaki</style>. May I ask... masked food-giver— I mean, my great savior, what is your name?

content: Mmph? Wait a minute... this whole time... {A惊讶}<style=SizeBig>Was I supposed to be looking for Daikabutomaru?!</style>

content: {A豆豆眼}{短暂停}Wait... uh, <style=SizeBig>how am I even supposed to find it?!</style>

content: Together! Let's work our tails off to uncover it!

content: {A生气}Mmph... Even if I've been searching for three days and nights, without aaany food or sleep at aaall, I... I won't give up!

content: Mmmmmmmmm—{A开心}You mean... some Kabutomaru merch? You really are such... an AMAZING person!

content: My Daikabutomaru is a <style=Highlight>kabuto beetle</style>. It's a kind of beetle that loves to perch on a nice tree branch, with loooong, loooong horns.
